attributes.action: make the criminal justice system work more for the victims of crime than the perpetrators.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sentencing needs to reflect the severity of a crime and the suffering it has caused. Much longer sentences need to be given for serious crimes such as crimes of violence, burgalry etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
